ygData.subject: Re: Hot Rod/Epyon
ygData.msgSnippet: Megan s dad had a heart attack, and she won t be online for a while. She gave me control of her chars till she gets back. ... IR hears Prowl s approving

Megan's dad had a heart attack, and she won't be online for a while. She gave me control of her chars till she gets back.

::IR/Prowl/Firearm/Cledar/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer::

IR hears Prowl's approving thoughts, thankful that he was liking what she was doing. She looks around at the Maximals once more.

"We'll be using the city's facilities to train. When we're done, I have a surprise for all of you. But for now, lets get to work."

She looks over all the Maximals again and then turns around, her cape flying in the wind. She motions the Maximals to follow her as she heads toward the entrance to Maximal City.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cledar, Rixer, Forrior, and Blyer march off behind Iron Raptor, staying in perfect formation. Prowl and Firearm follow suit, though its been a while since the Maximals actually had any sort of training activity. The new Maximals were impressed about the leadership, the old ones impressed about the improvement.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Ratchet/Sideswipe/Orion:::
> 
> ::They hear everything that Iron Raptor says.  Ratchet and Sideswipe 
> personally can't wait to start drilling. They could use the practice.  Orion 
> on the other hand was thinking more about what Iron Raptor was planning.  But 
> all three of their thoughts agreed on one thing: Iron Raptor's getting 
> better::
